currency_format.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

cart_free_shipping_min_amount.label: Free shipping min amount
cart_free_shipping_min_amount.info: The free shipping threshold is fixed at a specific amount in USD. It may vary for other currencies.

product_card_image_config.label: Image fit
product_card_image_config.info: Container is best for transparent background, Cover is best for detailed background

type_header_font.label: Font

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

variant_color_style.info: Color swatches are Shopify's default swatch settings. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/category-metafields/using-category-metafields)

logo_position.label: Logo position

sticky_header_type.label: Sticky type

currency_header.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

language_header.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

bind_to_main_menu.label: Bind to main menu
bind_to_main_menu.info: Use this setting to specify which position in the main menu the Mega Menu should appear. The numbering starts from 1, representing the order from left to right.

time.label: Count to
time.info: Enter the correct date and time format (for example 2024-12-30 00:00)

header__1.info: Newsletter added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list.

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__3.info: To add a currency/region, go to your region settings.

header__5.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

footer_menu.label: Footer menu
footer_menu.info: Displays only top-level footer menu items.

position_banner.label: Banner position
position_banner.info: Using when the banner is collection image

settings.paragraph: Line item properties are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart.
settings.label: Label

required.label: Required
required.info: If you use 'Required' with a checkbox, then the checkbox will need to be checked for the customer to add the item to the cart.

checkbox_header.info: Requires line item property type to be 'Checkbox'.

radio_header.info: Requires line item property type to be 'Radio buttons'.

settings.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

dropdown_header.info: Requires line item property type to be 'Dropdown list'.

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.info: The minimum quantity of items that a customer must purchase to receive the discount.

discount_value.label: Discount value
discount_value.info: The value of the discount that a customer will receive when they purchase the minimum quantity of items.

product_list.label: Product
product_list.info: The product that the discount will be applied to.

highlight_text.label: Highlight text
highlight_text.info: Highlight the discount on the product page.

low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
low_inventory_threshold.info: Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account.

image_height.label: Image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

settings.paragraph: Cart attributes are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart.

attributes_required.label: Required
attributes_required.info: If you use 'Required' with a checkbox, then the checkbox will need to be checked for the customer to add the item to the cart.

attributes_checkbox_header.info: Requires line item attributes type to be 'Checkbox'.

attributes_radio_header.info: Requires line item attributes type to be 'Radio buttons'.

settings.attributes_info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

attributes_dropdown_header.info: Requires line item attributes type to be 'Dropdown list'.

limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

video_url.info: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

video_alt_text.info: Describe the video fo customers using screen readers.[Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/fr/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

color_config_enable.label: Invert colors for specific images in dark mode
Invert colors for specific images in dark mode

selector.label: Scroll to target
selector.info: Select the element to scroll to, using either a class or an ID of the element. For example: '.footer' or '#footer'. Specifically, to scroll to the top of the page, use the selector: '#top'.

x_axis_labels.label: The array of labels along the x axis.

y_axis_labels.label: The array of labels along the y axis.

video_url.label: Video url

video_alt_text.label: Video alt text
video_alt_text.info: Describe the video fo customers using screen readers.[Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/fr/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

time.info: Enter the correct date and time format (for example 2024-12-30 00:00)
